forum.views.create_topic(request, cat)[source]¶

create new topic

Parameters:
  • request (object) – object contain context of request
  • cat (slug) – slug of categorie
Variables:
  • cat – categorie object selected by slug
  • form – form for create topic
  • errors – dict of process error
  • create – new topic
  • topic – get the new topic
  • context – define the context for display page
Returns:

HTTPResponse
